summary:
The Muslim world, or Islamic world, refers to countries where Islam is a significant religion. It has a rich history spanning 1,400 years, with major advances in science, art, and philosophy. Today, over 1.8 billion people, or 25% of the world, are Muslims. They are mostly found in the Middle East, Central Asia, and Southeast Asia. The largest Muslim-majority country is Indonesia.

Sunni (87-90%) and Shia (10-13%) are the two main denominations. Islam is growing quickly due to high birth rates, and it's the fastest-growing major religion globally.
title: Muslim world
